<script>
/* è¡¨æƒ…çº¸å±‘ï¼šä»å±å¹•ä¸­éƒ¨å¾€å››å‘¨é£æ•£ */
(function(){
  window._burstEmojis = function(emojis){
    const arr = emojis && emojis.length ? emojis : ['ğŸ‰','ğŸŠ','âœ¨','ğŸ§§','ğŸª©','ğŸ’«','ğŸ¥³'];
    const box = document.createElement('div');
    box.className = 'confetti';
    document.body.appendChild(box);

    const N = 18; // æ•°é‡å¯è°ƒ
    const centerX = window.innerWidth / 2;
    const centerY = window.scrollY + window.innerHeight * 0.35; // ç¨å¾®é ä¸Š

    for(let i=0;i<N;i++){
      const s = document.createElement('span');
      s.textContent = arr[Math.random()*arr.length|0];
      const font = 18 + Math.random()*14; // 18~32px
      s.style.fontSize = font + 'px';
      s.style.left = centerX + 'px';
      s.style.top = centerY + 'px';
      box.appendChild(s);

      // è§¦å‘é£æ•£ï¼ˆå¼‚æ­¥è®©æµè§ˆå™¨å…ˆæ¸²æŸ“åˆå§‹ä½ç½®ï¼‰
      requestAnimationFrame(()=>{
        const dx = (Math.random()*600 - 300);          // å·¦å³åç§»
        const dy = (280 + Math.random()*220);          // ä¸‹è½è·ç¦»
        const rot = (Math.random()*540 - 270);         // æ—‹è½¬
        s.style.transform = `translate(${dx}px, ${dy}px) rotate(${rot}deg)`;
        s.style.opacity = '0';
      });
    }

    // æ¸…ç†DOM
    setTimeout(()=> box.remove(), 1100);
  };
})();
</script>

<script>
(function(){
  // åŸå§‹ç¥ç¦æ± ï¼ˆè¿™é‡Œæ”¹å†…å®¹ï¼‰
  const pool = [
    'ç¥ä½ åƒé¸Ÿï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨è®¨åŒçš„äººå¤´ä¸Šæ‹‰å±',
    'ç¥ä½ åšå—å–½ï¼Œéšæ—¶æ‰‡è®¨åŒé¬¼å¤§æ¯”å…œ',
    'èŠ±ä¼šè°¢ï¼Œäººä¼šå‘†ï¼Œå§çš„çˆ±ï¼Œnever say goodbey',
    'å¤´å‘æ°¸è¿œæµ“å¯†ï¼Œå¤§ä¾¿æ°¸è¿œé€šç•…',
    'å¤§ç—…å°ç—…éƒ½æ²¡æœ‰ï¼Œçˆ±äººé™ªä¼´æ‰‹ç‰µæ‰‹',
    'ä»Šå¹´å‘æ¥æ˜å¹´å‘ï¼Œè¦å•¥å•¥æ¥ç¬‘å“ˆå“ˆ',
    'ä¸åŠ³è€Œè·ï¼Œåäº«å…¶æˆ'
  ];

  // ä¸é‡å¤æŠ½ï¼šç”¨â€œè¢‹å­â€æ‹·è´ä¸€ä»½ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡æŠ½ä¸€æ¡å¹¶ç§»é™¤
  let bag = pool.slice();
  let exhausted = false;

  const btn = document.getElementById('draw2');
  const out = document.getElementById('card2');

  function wobbleOnce(el){
    el.classList.remove('wobble');
    void el.offsetWidth;            // é‡ç½®åŠ¨ç”»
    el.classList.add('wobble');
  }

  function drawOne(){
    if (bag.length === 0) {
      exhausted = true;
      out.textContent = 'æ­å–œä½ æŠ½åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰ç¥ç¦ï¼æ–°ä¸€è½®ç¥ç¦å¾…å‘å°„ğŸš€';
      wobbleOnce(out);
      btn.textContent = 'å†æ¥ä¸€è½®';
      return;
    }
    const i = Math.floor(Math.random() * bag.length);
    const pick = bag.splice(i, 1)[0];  // ä»è¢‹å­ç§»é™¤
    out.textContent = ' ' + pick;
    wobbleOnce(out);
  }

  if (btn && out) {
    btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
      // å¦‚æœåˆšåˆšæŠ½å®Œä¸€è½®ï¼Œä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡ç‚¹å‡»é‡ç½®
      if (exhausted) {
        bag = pool.slice();
        exhausted = false;
        btn.textContent = 'æŠ½ä¸€å¼ ';
      }
      drawOne();
    });
  }
})();
</script>
